ygData.subject: Trueshot Bows & Other things
ygData.msgSnippet: I have made several Trueshot Bows, you need to be to the point where you are able to make the Darkwood Bow (which makes sense since they are essentially the
ygData.messageBody:
I have made several Trueshot Bows, you need to be to the point where you are
able to make the Darkwood Bow (which makes sense since they are essentially
the same bow, although the Trueshot has less range). I am not quite to 200
skill now and fail about half time (which is the same failure rate I am
having making Darkwoods).


I want to know this though, has anyone actually found the Steel or Ceramic
Bow Staves listed in the Bowyer Book? I have looked in the Centaur Village,
Aviak Village, all over Kelethin and Surefall Glades, checked the Gypsy
Camps, etc... Still no staves. Someone told me that they actually saw
someone weilding a Ceramic Bow, but didn't ask the guy where he got it. Any
information on this would be extremely helpful.

Last question, has anyone out there gotten over 200 skill yet?

Vapn (Master Fletcher, Povar)
